author: markt
msg: Some Throwables must always be re-thrown

author: olamy
msg: [MASSEMBLY-499] Poor performance in DirectoryArchiver due to unnecessary native calls
This new feature "jvm chmod" is now configuration thru a mojo parameter

author: wrowe
msg: allowed_methods is an embedded struct (not struct ptr) of just two
members, method_mask and method_list; simplify this for lua & debugging.
It is represented in C as a struct for purposes of initialization,
since the mask and list should both be zeroed out/prepared together.

author: bhavani
msg: UIMA-1886 fixed deserialzation of string feature set to an empty string.
